languages.text: "И пусть вас это не удивляет. Среди пиратов Простора полно еретической сволочи, но Денз был не таким. Он истинно верил. И в нем было больше от идеалов {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, чем в иных офицеришках. Сильный, волевой лидер — разве не благодаря таким мы покорили тысячи звездных систем?"

"If you're surprised, you shouldn't be. There are plenty of heretic scum among the pirates of the Expanse, but Denz wasn't one of them. He was a true believer. And he shared more of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s ideals than some of those stiff-necked officers. A leader with an iron fist and an iron will — don't we owe our conquest of thousands of star systems to people like that?"
languages.original_text: "И пусть вас это не удивляет. Среди пиратов Простора полно еретической сволочи, но Денз был не таким. Он истинно верил. И в нем было больше от идеалов {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, чем в иных офицеришках. Сильный, волевой лидер — разве не благодаря таким мы покорили тысячи звездных систем?"

traits.locale_text: "And let that not come as a surprise to you. There are plenty of heretic scum among the pirates of Koronus, but Denz wasn't one of them. He was a true believer. And he shared more of the Imperium's ideals than some of the pettier officers. A leader strong of body and will — don't we owe our conquest of thousands of star systems to people like that?"

"And let that not come as a surprise to you. There are plenty of heretic scum among the pirates of Koronus, but Denz wasn't one of them. He was a true believer. And he shared more of the Imperium's ideals than some of the pettier officers. A leader strong of body and will — don't we owe our conquest of thousands of star systems to people like that?"

And he shared more of the Imperium's ideals than some of those stiff-necked officers. A leader with an iron fist and an iron will — don't we owe our conquest of thousands of star systems to people like that?"

And he shared more of the Imperium's ideals than some of those stiff-necked officers. A leader with an iron fist and an iron will — don't we owe our conquest of thousands of star systems to people like that?"

"If you're surprised, you shouldn't be. There are plenty of heretic scum among the pirates of the Expanse, but Denz wasn't one of them. He was a true believer. And he shared more of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s ideals than some of those stiff-necked officers. A leader with an iron fist and an iron will — don't we owe our conquest of thousands of star systems to people like that?"

languages.text: “如果你对此感到惊讶，那实在是没必要。科罗努斯扩区的海盗中有很多崇拜异端的败类，但丹兹并不是这样的人。他是个非常虔诚的人，而且与那些死板的军官相比，他才更像是{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}理想的仆人。他是位出色的领袖，既有钢铁般的手腕，也有钢铁般的意志。我们之所以能征服几千个恒星星系，靠的不就是这样的人吗？”
languages.original_text: "If you're surprised, you shouldn't be. There are plenty of heretic scum among the pirates of the Expanse, but Denz wasn't one of them. He was a true believer. And he shared more of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s ideals than some of those stiff-necked officers. A leader with an iron fist and an iron will — don't we owe our conquest of thousands of star systems to people like that?"

traits.locale_text: “如果你对此感到惊讶，那实在是没必要。科罗努斯扩区的海盗中有很多崇拜异端的败类，但丹兹并不是这样的人。他是个非常虔诚的人，而且与那些死板的军官相比，他才更像是{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}理想的仆人。他是位出色的领袖，既有钢铁般的手腕，也有钢铁般的意志。我们之所以能征服几千个恒星星系，靠的不就是这样的人吗？”

languages.text: «Que no le sorprenda. Hay mucha escoria hereje entre los piratas de la Extensión, pero Denz no era uno de ellos. Era un auténtico creyente, y representaba mejor los ideales del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} que muchos de esos oficiales altaneros. Un líder con puño y voluntad de hierro... ¿Acaso no debemos la conquista de miles de sistemas estelares a la gente como él?».
languages.original_text: "If you're surprised, you shouldn't be. There are plenty of heretic scum among the pirates of the Expanse, but Denz wasn't one of them. He was a true believer. And he shared more of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s ideals than some of those stiff-necked officers. A leader with an iron fist and an iron will — don't we owe our conquest of thousands of star systems to people like that?"

traits.locale_text: «Que no le sorprenda. Hay mucha escoria hereje entre los piratas de la Extensón, pero Denz no era uno de ellos. Era un auténtico creyente, y representaba mejor los ideales del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} que muchos de esos oficiales altaneros. Un líder con puño y voluntad de hierro... ¿Acaso no debemos la conquista de miles de sistemas estelares a la gente como él?».

languages.text: 「意外ですか？エクスパンスには異端的な海賊が数多くのさばっていますが、デンツは違いました。彼は真の信奉者でした。それに、傲慢な役員たちよりよほど{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の理想を理解していました。鉄の拳と鉄の意志を持つリーダー…我々が何千もの星系を支配できたのは、そのような方たちの尽力によるものではないでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "If you're surprised, you shouldn't be. There are plenty of heretic scum among the pirates of the Expanse, but Denz wasn't one of them. He was a true believer. And he shared more of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s ideals than some of those stiff-necked officers. A leader with an iron fist and an iron will — don't we owe our conquest of thousands of star systems to people like that?"

traits.locale_text: 「意外ですか？エクスパンスには異端的な海賊が数多くのさばっていますが、デンツは違いました。彼は真の信奉者でした。それに、傲慢な役員たちよりよほど{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の理想を理解していました。鉄の拳と鉄の意志を持つリーダー…我々が何千もの星系を支配できたのは、そのような方たちの尽力によるものではないでしょうか？」

languages.text: "Das sollte Euch nicht überraschen. Unter den Piraten der Ausdehnung gibt es viel ketzerischen Abschaum, aber Denz gehörte nicht dazu. Er war ein wahrer Gläubiger. Und er teilte mehr Ideale des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} als so manche halsstarrige Offiziere. Ein Anführer mit eiserner Faust und eisernem Willen – verdanken wir nicht die Eroberung von Tausenden von Sternensystemen solchen Leuten?"
languages.original_text: "If you're surprised, you shouldn't be. There are plenty of heretic scum among the pirates of the Expanse, but Denz wasn't one of them. He was a true believer. And he shared more of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s ideals than some of those stiff-necked officers. A leader with an iron fist and an iron will — don't we owe our conquest of thousands of star systems to people like that?"

traits.locale_text: "Das sollte Euch nicht überraschen. Unter den Piraten der Ausdehnung gibt es viel ketzerischen Abschaum, aber Denz gehörte nicht dazu. Er war ein wahrer Gläubiger. Und er teilte mehr Ideale des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} als so manche halsstarrige Offiziere. Ein Anführer mit eiserner Faust und eisernem Willen – verdanken wir nicht die Eroberung von Tausenden von Sternensystemen solchen Leuten?"

languages.text: « J'imagine votre surprise, mais elle n'a pas lieu d'être. Je ne nierai pas que les pirates des Étendues sont majoritairement des pourritures hérétiques, mais Denz n'était pas comme ça. C'était un croyant comme on en voit rarement. Il partageait plus d'idéaux de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} que bon nombre de ces officiers collet monté. Une main de fer guidée par une volonté de fer. Si nous avons pu conquérir des milliers de systèmes, c'est bien grâce à des gens de sa trempe. »
languages.original_text: "If you're surprised, you shouldn't be. There are plenty of heretic scum among the pirates of the Expanse, but Denz wasn't one of them. He was a true believer. And he shared more of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s ideals than some of those stiff-necked officers. A leader with an iron fist and an iron will — don't we owe our conquest of thousands of star systems to people like that?"

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine votre surprise, mais elle n'a pas lieu d'être. Je ne nierai pas que les pirates des Étendues sont majoritairement des pourritures hérétiques, mais Denz n'était pas comme ça. C'était un croyant comme on en voit rarement. Il partageait plus d'idéaux de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} que bon nombre de ces officiers collet monté. Une main de fer guidée par une volonté de fer. Si nous avons pu conquérir des milliers de systèmes, c'est bien grâce à des gens de sa trempe. »

languages.text: Şaşıracak bir şey yok. Enginlik'in korsanları arasında kâfir alçaklar boldur ama Denz onlardan değildi. İman sahibiydi. Hatta {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} ülkülerine o at gözlüklü subaylardan daha bağlıydı. Demirden yumruklara ve iradeye sahip bir önderdi. Binlerce yıldız sisteminin fethini onun gibilere borçlu değil miyiz?
languages.original_text: "If you're surprised, you shouldn't be. There are plenty of heretic scum among the pirates of the Expanse, but Denz wasn't one of them. He was a true believer. And he shared more of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s ideals than some of those stiff-necked officers. A leader with an iron fist and an iron will — don't we owe our conquest of thousands of star systems to people like that?"

traits.locale_text: "Şaşırmanızın manası yok. Enginlik korsanları arasında bolca kâfir alçak bulunur ama Denz onlardan biri değildi. İnançlarına sadıktı. Hatta {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un ülkülerine o kibirli subaylardan daha bağlıydı. Demir yumruklara ve demir iradeye sahip bir liderdi. Binlerce yıldız sistemindeki fethimizi onun gibilere borçlu değil miyiz?"
